meanings.definition: A child's toy consisting of a stick with a model of a horse's head at one end.
meanings.sent1: Children enjoy playing with hobbyhorses in the park.
meanings.sent2: She collected various hobbyhorses to add to her toy collection.
meanings.sent3: The little girl giggled as she pretended her hobbyhorse was talking to her.
meanings.sent4: His imagination soared as he rode his hobbyhorse through the imaginary fields.
meanings.sent5: The colorful hobbyhorse brought joy to the children at the birthday party.

meanings.sent1: Painting is one of her hobbyhorses that she enjoys in her free time.
meanings.sent2: Reading mystery novels is his hobbyhorse on lazy Sunday afternoons.
meanings.sent3: Her friends teased her about her unusual hobbyhorse of collecting vintage spoons.
meanings.sent4: His hobbyhorse of gardening bloomed into a beautiful backyard oasis.
meanings.sent5: Traveling to new places became her ultimate hobbyhorse after retirement.
